amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: TITLE IX--ADDITIONAL PROVISION SEC. 901. None of the funds made available by this Act may be used to relocate the National Institute of Food and Agriculture or the Economic Research Service outside of the National Capital Region.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in Part B of House Report 116-126 to prohibit the use of funds from being used to relocate the National Institute of Food and Agriculture or the Economic Research Service outside of the National Capital Region.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Norton amendment (A003) Agreed to by recorded vote: 226 - 198 (Roll no. 412).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A003) offered by Ms. Norton.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Norton amendment (A003) Agreed to by recorded vote: 226 - 198 (Roll no. 412).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
